articles.title: PMB Lauds European Union’s Support For Nigeria - LEADERSHIP NEWS
articles.description: By Jonathan Nda- Isaiah, Abuja The European Union (EU) has been of help to Nigeria in diverse ways, including humanitarian and trade relations, President Muhammadu Buhari has said. The president according to a statement by his media aide, Femi Adesina spoke y…
articles.content:
By Jonathan Nda- Isaiah, Abuja
